description: Ensuring financial sustainability of the protected area system of Serbia

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The main objective of this PPG funded activities will be the development of an eligible GEF MSP proposal. The expected objective of the MSP project is to improve the financial sustainability of Serbia’s Protected Areas System.
subproject.title: PIMS 4281 BD PPG PAs

title: GEF 4281 BD PPG
